metadata.title: CVE-2024-53126 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:vdpa: solidrun: Fix UB bug with devresIn psnet_open_pf_bar() and snet_open_vf_bar() a string later passed topcim_iomap_regions() is placed on the stack. Neitherpcim_iomap_regions() nor the functions it calls copy that string.Should the string later ever be used, this, consequently, causesundefined behavior since the stack frame will by then have disappeared.Fix the bug by allocating the strings on the heap throughdevm_kasprintf().
